testcase.name: Practice form doldurma
testcase.system-out: Given Kullanici "https://testpages.herokuapp.com/styled/basic-html-form-test.html" adresine gider.passed When username "kullanici adi" password "sifre" ve textarea "metin alani" kisimlarini doldurur.passed And bir dosya yukler........................................................passed And checkbox_biri secer.....................................................passed And radio_ikiyi secer.......................................................passed And selection item_ucu secer................................................passed And dropdown itmem_dortu secer..............................................passed And submite tiklar..........................................................passed Then dosyanin yuklendigini dogrular.........................................passed
